pending module name
===================

Usage
-----

### server.coffee

```coffee

viewport = require 'pending module name'
app      = express()

viewport.mount app: app

```

### main.js (clientside)

Assumes clientside uses requirejs

```js

requirejs.config( {
  'packages': ['viewport']
} );

requirejs( ['viewport'], function(Viewport) {

  new Viewport( /* pending args */ );

} );

```
